what: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
title: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
text: dataset containing early warning messages landslide-prone areas, including report details, validity periods, locations, warning levels.

title: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
text: data frame following variables: ID_DataAnalyst chr. Identifier data analyst Report_Date dttm. Date landslide early warning report issued. Report_Time chr. Time report issued, HH:MM format. Message_ID chr. Unique identifier warning message. Encodes warning type, date, time, message sequence. Valid_From_Date dttm. Start date warning valid. Valid_From_Time chr. Start time warning valid, HH:MM format. Valid_To_Date dttm. End date warning remains valid. Valid_To_Time chr. End time warning remains valid, HH:MM format. District chr. Administrative district potential landslide risk identified. Location chr. Specific locality, town, area within district affected warning. Level dbl. Landslide early warning level (1 = Level 1, 2 = Level 2, 3 = Level 3). Represents severity situation. State dbl. Direction magnitude landslide (1-shifted one level , 2-shifted two levels , -1-shifted one level , -2-shifted two levels ).

title: Landslide early warning messages during Ditwah strom in November, 2025 — ditwah_landslides_warnings
text: Based land slides early warning pdf reports published Disaster Management Centre, Sri Lanka. data PDF files cleaned processes package authors.
